title: Standing Against Misunderstandings
description: In this sermon, several misunderstandings, misconceptions, falsehoods and outright lies concerning problems and difficulties in the life of a Christian or comments from those observing the life of a Christian are exposed and addressed.

title: The Overwhelmed Heart
description: Are you overwhelmed by life’s circumstances? Perhaps you are not overwhelmed today, but what about tomorrow? The psalmist David went to God Almighty when in distress and trouble. God hears the softest whisper in prayer. We need to purpose to trust in the Lord in times of troubles. There is light at both ends of life’s tunnels. He will see you through for His glory.
